QuestData.Title: The Ancient Trials
QuestData.Description:
<As the raven stares into your eyes, an odd voice fills your mind.>
I know who you are, champion, and I know what you seek.
Come to me, if you think yourself truly worthy.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: This strange old vrykul seems to know you somehow...
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Havi near Aggramar's Vault.
